title: 8 Free Printable Vision Board Templates and Examples for 2024
author: Yiyang Zhang
description: Unravel the elegance of vision board templates for your needs. Discover 8 free printable examples of vision board templates to upgrade your work efficiency in 2024.
md:
Are you ready to turn your dreams into reality? A vision board can be the powerful tool you need to manifest your desires and create a life that truly aligns with your personal goals. But where do you start? With so many ideas swirling in your head, it can be overwhelming to put them all together in a visually appealing and meaningful way. That's where vision board templates come in handy. In this article, we'll explore what exactly a vision board template is and why it's essential for crafting an effective vision board. We'll also provide you with 8 free printable templates specifically designed for 2024, so you can get started on bringing your dreams to life. Let's dive into the world of vision board templates and discover how these templates can help shape an extraordinary year ahead! ## What is a Vision Board Template? A [vision board template](https://affine.pro/templates/vision-board-template-2024) is a pre-designed layout that helps you create a blueprint for your vision board. It provides structure and guidance, making it easier for you to organize your life goals, dream job, and aspirations into a visually appealing collage. By using pre-designed templates, you can create your vision board with ease while saving time and energy on layout design. These templates are flexible and customizable, allowing you to express your unique vision. Curate images that align with your aspirations and easily update and revise them as needed throughout the year. ## How to make a Good Vision Board Template? When it comes to creating a vision board, the template you choose plays a crucial role in helping you manifest your dreams and goals. But what exactly makes a good vision board template? Let's dive in and explore some key factors. * **Simplicity is key**. A good vision board template should have a clean layout that allows for easy organization of images, quotes, and affirmations. It should be visually appealing without being overwhelming. * **Customization options are important**. Look for templates that allow you to personalize colors, fonts, elements and backgrounds to align with your unique style and preferences. This way, you can create a vision board that truly resonates with you. * **Versatility is essential**. When choosing a vision board template, you may want to use your vision boards for different purposes throughout the year or even update it periodically as you achieve certain milestones in your journey toward success. * **Accessibility is paramount**. Opting for free printable vision board templates means they're readily available online so that anyone can access them easily without any hassle. Remember: each person has their unique vision when it comes to designing their dream life on paper through visual aids like vision boards. So ultimately, choose a template that speaks to YOU – one that ignites inspiration within you every time you look at it! # 8 Free [Vision Board Templates](https://affine.pro/templates/vision-board-template-2024) to Use for 2024 Looking to make 2024 your best year yet? A vision board can be a powerful tool to help you visualize and manifest your goals. And the best part? You don't have to start from scratch! There are plenty of free vision board templates available that can jumpstart your creative process. ### 1. AFFiNE Sales Business Model Vision Board Template This AFFiNE sales business model vision board template is meticulously crafted for business operations teams seeking a comprehensive strategy in the field of sales. It delves into the establishment of robust partnerships, outlines pivotal sales activities, identifies essential resources and value propositions, underscores the significance of customer relationships, explores varied sales channels, and meticulously dissects the cost structure and revenue streams. ### 2. [AFFiNE](https://affine.pro/) Vision Board Template for Brainstorming If you're more of a visual thinker, the AFFiNE [vision board template](https://affine.pro/templates/vision-board-template-2024) for brainstorming is for you. Create a page by connecting different focus areas with colorful arrows or lines. Let your ideas flow freely! This template divides your vision board into sections dedicated to specific goals, such as a checklist, map, trips, and personal growth. Organize each area with relevant visuals and motivating quotes. ### 3. [Canva](https://www.canva.com/) Cute Inspiration Vision Board Template ![kuzvC1ViUDqifPNuyYDANI0chGLo-oKshbxBNN0fkGU=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/kuzvC1ViUDqifPNuyYDANI0chGLo-oKshbxBNN0fkGU=) The Canva cute inspiration vision board template Sometimes images speak louder than words. This template allows you to create a colourful and inspiring cloud filled with keywords that represent what you want to achieve. You can organize your boards by areas of your life, such as relationships, careers, finances, home, travel, personal growth, and health. With the help of this template, you can easily visualize your aspirations and take steps toward achieving them. ### 4. Canva Elegant Vision Board Template ![p2Hj3tAsyLjh6MH-0QmagTLEEAqWEfBhiKzWkyeDd50=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/p2Hj3tAsyLjh6MH-0QmagTLEEAqWEfBhiKzWkyeDd50=) The Canva elegant vision board template embraces various square shapes and beautifully composed placeholders for images, notes, and colour swatches. This template will serve as your daily visual reminder to facilitate your daily work and study. ### 5. ClickUp Vision Board Template ![zYGVcwirFnKXjDBmNqxLXogX1c1bT3H1xWYf8ScCXGQ=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/zYGVcwirFnKXjDBmNqxLXogX1c1bT3H1xWYf8ScCXGQ=) The ClickUp vision board template is a valuable tool for your team to define your product's purpose, target audience, clients, and users. Once you have laid out the fundamentals, you can delve deeper into the problems your product will solve and the resources required for success. ### 6. ClickUp Vision to Values Board Template ![H3iaFyE_P0wzSYuLljI79o_ky9PGiCk4L-m_c_GZ1uU=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/H3iaFyE_P0wzSYuLljI79o_ky9PGiCk4L-m_c_GZ1uU=) The ClickUp vision to values template guides you and your team through the process of documenting all the necessary aspects required to define your company or project's direction. Think of it as a pre-worksheet that assists you in creating a digital vision board. ### 7. Notion New Year's Vision Board Template ![prlSFa6FuszrBHTjQR4yC9-g6u10dGKE74hWcHy1wEM=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/prlSFa6FuszrBHTjQR4yC9-g6u10dGKE74hWcHy1wEM=) The Notion New Year's vision board template can help you keep your goals and inspirations in focus throughout the year. With Notion's partnership, you can find the perfect source of inspiration for any goal you have in mind. If you want to add more details, simply click on a gallery card to create a goal-specific vision board, set expectations, or even track your progress throughout the year. ### 8. Notion Vision Board Template for Class Notes ![qfF6kTEpv_9fRbVLxwqcvq01h4YNgjmQVVYW7dNRDuI=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/qfF6kTEpv_9fRbVLxwqcvq01h4YNgjmQVVYW7dNRDuI=) The Notion vision board template can make things easier for you. With this template, you can capture all your class-related notes, tag them by class, and automatically date them. You can easily identify what you need to review and upload any related materials. This way, you can keep all your notes in one spot and never miss out on important information. ### Harness Vision Board Templates to Improve Your Workflow Launching a successful product or project begins with a clear sense of direction. Vision boards are invaluable tools for aligning your team and ensuring everyone knows the path forward. Whether you're a creative, a technical expert, or a team leader, the challenge of where to start is universal. Enter AFFiNE's vision board templates - a user-friendly, collaborative platform.
AFFiNE facilitates the creation process and guides anchoring your vision in your core values. Consider AFFiNE your comprehensive vision board kit for a smooth start. If you're already an AFFiNE user, integrate a template into your Workspace. If you haven't explored AFFiNE's powerful project management and collaboration platform, sign up today, and take it for a spin - with some added sparkle if you wish!" ✨ **Key features:** * **Tailored Vision Boarding Precision with AFFiNE's Database:** AFFiNE's database seamlessly integrates Kanban and Table views for dynamic vision boarding. By smoothly transforming your blocks into a Kanban view, effortlessly classify based on storyboard properties such as date, progress, and link. This allows for intuitive drag-and-drop functionality, ensuring precise organization and alignment of your project execution. Switching to the Table view offers a comprehensive project overview, enhancing the efficiency of your narrative development. With intuitive controls, track deadlines and manage unscheduled tasks seamlessly. ![bY0EkoVLJfBpOjymBoGUxE0LAiQuW1bNgYA-FU1OQlA=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/bY0EkoVLJfBpOjymBoGUxE0LAiQuW1bNgYA-FU1OQlA=) * **Streamlining Projects Through Powerful Templates:** AFFiNE revolutionizes project planning with a diverse template gallery, featuring robust [storyboards](https://affine.pro/blog/10-best-free-storyboard-creator-software), concept maps, and monthly calendars. This curated collection accelerates project execution, serving as a launchpad to skip groundwork and enhance efficiency. * Crafted for seamless collaboration, AFFiNE's templates offer structured canvases, saving time in project management, content creation, and planning. AFFiNE transforms event management into a streamlined, efficient, and collaborative experience with these tools. ![cXPfaH7yGKuxN6x24MrIF_2SxJEMnAdSfT2q9HhQpD4=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/cXPfaH7yGKuxN6x24MrIF_2SxJEMnAdSfT2q9HhQpD4=) * **Effortless Vision Boarding with AFFiNE's Frame & Presentation:** In edgeless mode, create and frame content effortlessly, forming standout decks with ease. Just tap the presentation button to bring your ideas to life seamlessly. * Our latest update optimizes frame visuals, eliminating borders for a sleek, uncluttered presentation. Enjoy distraction-free vision boarding with a polished and refined display, making your narratives shine with AFFiNE. ![cXPfaH7yGKuxN6x24MrIF_2SxJEMnAdSfT2q9HhQpD4=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/cXPfaH7yGKuxN6x24MrIF_2SxJEMnAdSfT2q9HhQpD4=) Presently, AFFiNE has launched its **Stable Version**, with ongoing efforts to develop a more comprehensive and dependable iteration.
